Workouts.name: Vertical Program
w1: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jump rope)
Bulgarian Split Squats: 3 sets x 8 reps (each leg)
Seated Calf Raises: 3 sets x 10 reps
w2: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jump rope)
Romanian Deadlifts: 4 sets x 6 reps
Dumbbell Lunges: 3 sets x 8 reps (each leg)
Glute-Ham Raises: 3 sets x 10 reps
Calf Raises (standing): 3 sets x 10 reps
Plyometric Box Jumps: 3 sets x 10 reps
w3: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jump rope)
Squat Jumps: 4 sets x 6 reps
Single-Leg Deadlifts: 3 sets x 8 reps (each leg)
Kettlebell Swings: 3 sets x 10 reps
Seated Calf Raises: 3 sets x 10 reps
Box Jumps: 3 sets x 10 reps

Workouts.name: Speed Program
w1: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jogging, jumping jacks, or high knees)
Sprint Intervals: 8 sets x 30 seconds on, 30 seconds off
w2: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jogging, jumping jacks, or high knees)
Hill Repeats: 6 sets x 30 seconds uphill, 30 seconds downhill recovery
Lunges: 3 sets x 10 reps (each leg)
Single-Leg Deadlifts: 3 sets x 8 reps (each leg)
Plyometric Lateral Jumps: 3 sets x 10 reps
w3: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jogging, jumping jacks, or high knees)
Fartlek Run: 30-40 minutes at varying speeds (e.g. 1 minute hard, 1 minute easy)
Plyometric Box Jumps: 3 sets x 10 reps
Bulgarian Split Squats: 3 sets x 8 reps (each leg)
Seated Calf Raises: 3 sets x 10 reps

Workouts.name: Leg Strength Program
w1: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jogging, cycling, or rowing machine)
Bulgarian Split Squats: 3 sets x 8 reps (each leg)
w2: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jogging, cycling, or rowing machine)
Lunges: 3 sets x 12 reps (each leg)
Leg Press: 4 sets x 8 reps
Hamstring Curls: 3 sets x 10 reps
Box Jumps: 3 sets x 10 reps
w3: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jogging, cycling, or rowing machine)
Romanian Deadlifts: 3 sets x 10 reps
Step-Ups: 3 sets x 12 reps (each leg)
Glute Bridges: 3 sets x 12 reps
Seated Calf Raises: 3 sets x 12 reps

Workouts.name: Push Strength Program
w1: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Barbell Bench Press: 4 sets x 6 reps
Incline Dumbbell Press: 3 sets x 8 reps
w2: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Overhead Press: 4 sets x 6 reps
Dumbbell Lateral Raises: 3 sets x 10 reps
Dumbbell Front Raises: 3 sets x 10 reps
Dips: 2 sets x max reps
w3: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Close-Grip Bench Press: 4 sets x 6 reps
Skull Crushers: 3 sets x 8 reps
Cable Tricep Extensions: 3 sets x 10 reps
Diamond Push-Ups: 2 sets x max reps

Workouts.name: Core Program
w1: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Russian Twists: 3 sets x 10 reps (each side)
Side Plank: 2 sets x 30 seconds (each side)
w2: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Reverse Crunches: 3 sets x 15 reps
Cable Woodchoppers: 3 sets x 10 reps (each side)
Superman Holds: 3 sets x 30 seconds
Plank with Knee Tucks: 2 sets x 10 reps (each side)
Standing Cable Oblique Twists: 3 sets x 10 reps (each side)
w3: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Hanging Leg Raises: 3 sets x 10 reps
Swiss Ball Crunches: 3 sets x 15 reps
V-Ups: 3 sets x 10 reps
Dead Bug: 2 sets x 10 reps (each side)
Plank with Alternating Leg Lifts: 2 sets x 10 reps (each side)

Workouts.name: Core Program
w1: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Single Leg Hops: 3 sets x 10 reps (each leg)
Side Shuffle and Sprint: 2 sets x 5 reps
w2: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Agility Hurdles: 2 sets x 6 drills
Lateral Bounds: 3 sets x 10 reps (each side)
Squat Jumps: 3 sets x 10 reps
T-Drill: 2 sets x 5 reps
Backward Running and Sprint: 2 sets x 5 reps
w3: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Agility Rings: 2 sets x 6 drills
Skater Jumps: 3 sets x 10 reps (each side)
Plyometric Push-ups: 3 sets x 10 reps
Zig-Zag Cone Drill: 2 sets x 5 reps
Forward and Backward Shuffle: 2 sets x 5 reps

Workouts.name: Pull Strength Program
w1: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
w2: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Lat Pulldowns: 4 sets x 8 reps
Cable Rows: 3 sets x 10 reps
Reverse Flyes: 3 sets x 12 reps
Bicep Curls: 2 sets x 12 reps
w3: Warm up with 5-10 minutes of light cardio (e.g. jumping jacks, high knees, or jog in place)
Chin-Ups: 3 sets x max reps
Hammer Curls: 3 sets x 10 reps
Dumbbell Rows: 3 sets x 10 reps (each arm)
Farmer's Walks: 3 sets x 60 seconds
